dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4247 IH: Restoring Financial Market Freedom Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Budd introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To repeal title VIII of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Restoring Financial Market Freedom Act of 2017.

subsection.text: Title VIII of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (12 U.S.C. 5461 et seq.) is repealed, and provisions of law amended by such title are restored and revived as if such title had never been enacted.
The table of contents in section 1(b) of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act is amended by striking the items relating to title VIII.
